item.description:
This New Year’s Eve, raise a glass to new beginnings with us and Lots of Laughs Comedy Lounge, located within China Blossom. On Monday, December 31st, 2012 from 9:30PM to 1:00AM, give a proper farewell to 2012 with a night of fine dining, live entertainment and laughs!

The 2013 countdown begins at 9:30PM, when you are invited to feast on your favorite China Blossom dishes at an all-you-can-eat premier buffet with live-action cooking and carving stations, create-your-own noodle soups and a diverse selection of sushi.
After your last supper of 2012, put on your dancing shoes & show off your signature moves to the beat of DJ Barry Mooney! Then a team of the best comics in Boston will take the stage for an all-star comedy show featuring Sal Votano, Christine Hurley and John David.

Toast to the New Year with a complimentary glass of champagne and festive hats & noisemakers. You won’t be starting off the New Year empty handed, as you’ll have a chance to test your luck with raffles, prizes and giveaways all night courtesy of China Blossom and Lots of Laughs.

Party into 2013 & enjoy a night of food and fun! Please call 978-687-1789, or visit *** http:// www.lotsoflaughsnewyearseve.eventbrite.com/ for more information or to PURCHASE TICKET****. Tickets are $75 per person and include an all-you-can-eat dinner buffet, comedy show, live entertainment, giveaways and a champagne toast at midnight.

Special hotel rates of $110 are available at the Wyndham Boston Andover with transportation to and from the event and a full breakfast included in the room rate. Rooms must be booked online at http://www.wyndham.com/groupevents2012/BOSAM_LAUGHS/main.wnt or under the group reservation “Lots of Laughs/ China Blossom New Year’s Eve.”

*********** I WOULD LIKE A FULL HEAD COUNT BY 12/23/12, TICKETS CAN BE PURCHASED BY CLICKING ON THE LINK ABOVE OR CALLING THE ABOVE NUMBER, THIS SOUNDS GREAT LAUGHTER, FOOD, DANCING AND CHAMPAGNE TOAST FOR A LOW PRICE OF 75.00 PER PERSON******* PLEASE NOTE IT FILLS UP QUICKLY SO PLEASE PURCHASE EARLY, THERE IS AMPLE PARKING BUT AS ALWAYS ITS NEW YEARS EVE BEST TO GET THERE EARLY SETTLE IN AND INTRODUCTIONS CAN BE MADE. LOOK FORWARD TO RINGING IN THE NEW YEAR.

***THIS EVENT IS CROSS POSTED PLEASE DO NOT SIGN UP UNLESS YOU ARE A DEFINITE, SINCE I NEED TO MAKE RESERVATIONS AND DO NOT FEEL LIKE TRACKING DOWN NO SHOWS, NO NEED TO REPLY NO IF NOT ATTENDING..THANK YOU KINDLY*****

All throughout the night, we give away bottles of wine, gas cards, gift certificates, etc!!! Everyone leaves with something. And we also raffle off a large flat screen tv that night as well.

*** UPDATE****

****It really is a fun night with people of all ages. Dress code last year was mixed. Some people went all out and wore gowns and suits, and some just dressed casual. Either way, they all had a fun night.

PAYMENT BY CREDIT CARDS EITHER ON LINE BY LINK ABOVE OR BY CALLING THE NUMBER ABOVE, AFTER YOU PURCHASE YOUR TICKET SEND AN EMAIL TO" CHRIS FLAHIVE" chris@chucklescomedyclub.com AND LET HIM KNOW YOU ARE WITH EVA MEET UP GROUP SO WE CAN INSURE TO SIT TOGETHER.....
item.name: NEW YEARS EVE EXTRAVAGANZA
